 College of Business and Economics





College of Business and Economics Student Success Initiatives

                            The Student Success Team within the College of Business and Economics is here to support you.
                            Connect with representatives from the offices listed below to identify services and opportunities
                            that will help you achieve your goals.
                        


Business Advising:
                                Connect with an advisor by appointment, live chat, or email and find answers to FAQ.
                            

Career Services:
                                Schedule a career advising appointment (zoom or in-person), register for workshops and career fairs, and access career resources.
                            

Business Tutoring:
                                Schedule an appointment (zoom or in-person).
                            

Graduate Programs:
                                Graduate students can schedule appointments, email an advisor about their master's program or submit graduate forms.
                            

College Academic Units:
                                Obtain permits or connect with faculty members through the college's six academic units.
                            










Make All the Right Connections

                                You will establish a strong professional network with more than 9,000 business students,
                                more than 60,000 alumni worldwide and considerable interaction with area business
                                leaders through internships, workshops and mentorships.
                            


An Immersive Experience

                                Your involvement in clubs, student leadership, volunteer work, international study trips and dozens of other opportunities provide a well-rounded, rich college experience and résumé-building skills.
                            




Fertile Ground for Jobs

                                Southern California is the right place to grow your career with the region’s strong and diverse business economy providing exceptional professional opportunities.
                            


A Degree and Timeframethat Works for You

                                By taking advantage of our extensive support programs, you will receive the
                                assistance you need to graduate on time with the experience and knowledge
                                to launch your career.
